org.point85.uom

Class NamedQuantity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.point85.uom.Quantity
      • org.point85.uom.NamedQuantity

  • public class NamedQuantity
extends Quantity
    This class represents a fundamental physical quantity that is invariant, for example "speed of light"
